label: embarkationLocation
comment: A logistics location where a found stowaway embarked upon the transport means on which they were discovered.

rangeIncludes.comment: A logistics related physical location or place.

domainIncludes.comment: A transport related person, such as a member of a crew or a passenger.
A person who is found hiding aboard a ship or other conveyance, such as in order to obtain free passage or elude detection.
